title: Gillian Keegan – 2021 Comments on Suicide Prevention
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Gillian Keegan, the Minister for Mental Health, on 26 November 2021.
content:
I know the last 18 months have been really challenging and many more people have been asking for help with their mental health.
